column1: Number of vehicles travelling between Canada and the United States 1 2

column2: Covers the period 1972 to date monthly data. Prior to 1972 do not coincide with current definitions and methods of collection. Refer to publication 66-201 annual 1972 for further explanation.

Travel data for NEXUS Highway, which is a program designed to expedite the border clearance process for low-risk, pre-approved travellers into Canada and the United States, are now included. Monthly data has been revised back to January 2010 to reflect this change.

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 24-10-0002-01 Number of vehicles travelling between Canada and the United States
